sniffer_ip.label: RockSniffer IP
sniffer_ip.tooltip: Enter the RockSniffer configured addon service ip address

sniffer_port.label: RockSniffer Port
sniffer_port.tooltip: Enter the RockSniffer configured addon service port

sniffer_pollrate.label: Pollrate (seconds)
sniffer_pollrate.tooltip: How often to poll the addon service (in seconds)

gg_guess_command_price.label: Cost to guess (points)
gg_guess_command_price.tooltip: How many points does it cost to guess

gg_autostart.label: Start automatically
gg_autostart.tooltip: Start the game automatically when RockSniffer reports a song starting

gg_autoend.label: End automatically
gg_autoend.tooltip: End the game automatically when RockSniffer reports a song ending

gg_autostart_songs.label: Autostart every x songs
gg_autostart_songs.tooltip:
Automatically start the guessing game every x songs
1 = Every song

gg_closedelay.label: Close delay (seconds)
gg_closedelay.tooltip: How long to wait before closing for new guesses (in seconds)

gg_reward.label: Reward (points)
gg_reward.tooltip: How many points the winner gets

gg_jackpot.label: Enable jackpot
gg_jackpot.tooltip: If someone guesses very close to the result, they will win a jackpot

gg_jackpot_threshold.label: Jackpot threshold
gg_jackpot_threshold.tooltip: Maximum distance from the result for jackpot

gg_jackpot_reward.label: Jackpot Reward (points)
gg_jackpot_reward.tooltip: How many points the jackpot winner gets

gg_videosync_delay.label: Results videosync delay
gg_videosync_delay.tooltip: How long the game result announcement is delayed
